医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了膳食补充剂中误导性的健康声明和未申报的成分施密德科学技术学院教授罗莎莉·赫尔伯格（Rosalee Hellberg）和学生卡林·哈里斯（Calin Harris）、黛安·金（Diane Kim）、米兰达·米兰达（Miranda Miranda）和雪冯·乔丹（Chevon Jordan）最近在《分析科学杂志》上发表的一项研究表明，一些补充剂公司可能会通过未经证实的健康声明和未声明的成分来误导消费者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-misleading-health-claims-and-undeclared-ingredients-in-dietary-supplements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-reveals-misleading-health-claims-and-undeclared-ingredients-in-dietary-supplements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f823c6a1-c283-49af-854c-c5ca17698f2f Wed, 15 May 2024 14:16:26 -0400 Study reveals misleading health claims and undeclared ingredients in dietary supplements
缺乏内心的声音使得执行言语记忆任务变得更加困难绝大多数人都在与自己进行持续的对话，这是一种内心的声音，在他们的日常生活中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Lack-of-inner-voice-makes-it-more-difficult-to-perform-verbal-memory-tasks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Lack-of-inner-voice-makes-it-more-difficult-to-perform-verbal-memory-tasks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d0bbbac-c7e2-49b0-8cc9-743822b454f9 Wed, 15 May 2024 14:12:31 -0400 Lack of inner voice makes it more difficult to perform verbal memory tasks
研究将肠道微生物组调节与社会行为变化联系起来一项研究表明，服用益生元和益生元可能会让人们对公平更加敏感，即使是以赚更少的钱为代价。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-links-gut-microbiome-modulation-to-changes-in-social-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-links-gut-microbiome-modulation-to-changes-in-social-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7897282-da00-40e1-be72-b56d835eca37 Wed, 15 May 2024 13:53:09 -0400 Study links gut microbiome modulation to changes in social behavior
科学家对神经母细胞瘤的遗传途径有了新的认识科学家们对儿童癌症的遗传途径有了新的认识，为定制治疗带来了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Scientists-discover-new-insight-into-the-genic-pathway-of-neuroblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Scientists-discover-new-insight-into-the-genic-pathway-of-neuroblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3e78dee-3ca3-4609-bf14-13d4eb982bc9 Wed, 15 May 2024 13:46:20 -0400 Scientists discover new insight into the genetic pathway of neuroblastoma
研究发现独特的血小板群与衰老和凝血疾病有关随着人们年龄的增长，他们更容易患上凝血疾病，当称为血小板的血细胞在不需要时聚集在一起，可能会导致中风和心血管疾病等重大问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-uncovers-unique-platelet-population-linked-to-aging-and-blood-clotting-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-uncovers-unique-platelet-population-linked-to-aging-and-blood-clotting-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1321410-5caf-49f6-9d8e-e642ac17e447 Wed, 15 May 2024 13:17:48 -0400 Study uncovers unique platelet population linked to aging and blood clotting diseases
了解公众对 IVF 多基因胚胎筛查的看法四分之三的美国成年人支持使用新兴技术来估计未来孩子患上受多种基因影响的健康状况的可能性；例如糖尿病、心脏病和抑郁症——；哈佛医学院研究人员领导的一项新的民意调查显示，在体外受精 (IVF) 期间植入胚胎之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Understanding-public-perception-of-polygenic-embryo-screening-for-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Understanding-public-perception-of-polygenic-embryo-screening-for-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9df1e40f-0321-4d18-8f46-e7c371613a68 Wed, 15 May 2024 13:08:00 -0400 Understanding public perception of polygenic embryo screening for IVF
研究小鼠汗腺中与年龄相关的基因表达变化一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 8 期，题为“Characterization of Age-linked Gene Expression Changes”在老鼠的汗腺中。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Investigating-age-linked-gene-express-changes-in-mouse-sweat-glands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Investigating-age-linked-gene-express-changes-in-mouse-sweat-glands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc3b00cf-9643-4800-bab7-aab05259b082 Wed, 15 May 2024 12:46:49 -0400 Investigating age-associated gene expression changes in mouse sweat glands
新的 PET 成像生物标志物 Gal-1 可预测肿瘤对免疫治疗的反应蛋白质半乳糖凝集素-1 (Gal-1) 已被确定为免疫检查点阻断 (ICB) 治疗的新 PET 成像生物标志物，使医生能够在开始治疗前预测肿瘤反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-PET-imaging-biomarker-Gal-1-predicts-tumor-responses-to-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-PET-imaging-biomarker-Gal-1-predicts-tumor-responses-to-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f52a170-985a-4b67-bb9f-113f41d29afe Wed, 15 May 2024 12:42:40 -0400 New PET imaging biomarker Gal-1 predicts tumor responses to immunotherapy
研究揭示了减少智能手机成瘾的有效策略密歇根大学的最新研究表明，帮助智能手机用户管理屏幕时间的最佳方法可能是让手机的使用变得越来越烦人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Research-reveals- effective-strategies-for-reducing-smartphone-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Research-reveals- effective-strategies-for-reducing-smartphone-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8f7588e-7b13-450b-ade1-c47b084d864e Wed, 15 May 2024 12:31:29 -0400
安妮斯顿·巴内特 (Aniston Barnette) 作为美国心脏协会的全国青少年影响力领导心肺复苏教育计划美国心脏协会的“全国青少年影响力”称号为 Z 世代变革者提供了一个有影响力的平台，以对抗心脏病，改善全国社区的健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Aniston-Barnette-leads-CPR-education-initiative-as-American-Heart-Associations-National-Teen-of-Impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Aniston-Barnette-leads-CPR-education-initiative-as-American-Heart-Associations-National-Teen-of-Impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba9a5538-31fb-40e4-ac87-df62c7ce6557 Wed, 15 May 2024 10:54:00 -0400 Aniston Barnette leads CPR education initiative as American Heart Association's National Teen of Impact
